content: one stitch 3 double_crochet all around 14 times you have 84 double_crochet all around round 7 repeat 5 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch all around 14 times you have 98 double_crochet all around round 8 repeat 2 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 4 double_crochet all around 14 times you have 112 double_crochet all around round 9 repeat 7 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch all around 14 times you have 126 double_crochet all around round 10 repeat 3 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 5 double_crochet all around 14 times you have 140 double_crochet all around round 11 repeat 9 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch all around 14 times you have 154 double_crochet all around magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round 12 repeat 4 double_crochet 2 double_crochet in one stitch 6 double_crochet all around 14 times you have 168 double_crochet all around the spiral part is finished now it s time to make seven legs obviously they are not done in the round so you will have to turn your work after each row first of all put a marker in every 24th stitch of the spiral this way there will be 23 stitches between each pair of markers not all of the seven legs have a base of 24 some legs will be more narrow see the photo for details magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com while making legs always use 3 chain as the first double_crochet in a row if a row starts with dc3-decrease or dc2-decrease always use 2ch as the first double_crochet leg a row 1 24 double_crochet turn row 2 dc3-decrease 18 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 3 dc3-decrease 14 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 4 16 double_crochet turn row 5 16 double_crochet turn row 6 16 double_crochet turn row 7 3 double_crochet in one stitch 14 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in one stitch turn row 8 double_crochet-increase 18 double_crochet double_crochet-increase turn row 9 22 double_crochet turn row 10 22 double_crochet turn row 11 dc3-decrease 16 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 12 dc3-decrease 12 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 13 hdc3-decrease 8hdc hdc3-decrease turn row 14 sc3-decrease 4 single_crochet sc3-decrease bind off leg b - its base has only 16 stitches so skip 4 stitches from the marker row 1 dc3-decrease 10 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 2 12 double_crochet turn row 3 12 double_crochet turn row 4 12 double_crochet turn row 5 12 double_crochet turn row 6 3 double_crochet in one stitch 10 double_crochet 3 double_crochet in one stitch turn row 7 double_crochet-increase 14 double_crochet double_crochet-increase turn row 8 dc3-decrease 12 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 9 dc3-decrease 8 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 10 hdc3-decrease 4 half_double_crochet hdc3-decrease bind off magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com leg c - its base has only 18 stitches so skip 3 stitches from the marker row 1 dc3-decrease 12 double_crochet dc3-decrease turn row 2 double_crochet-increase 12 double_crochet double_crochet-increase turn row 3 16 double_crochet turn row 4 dc3-decrease 10
